official_title: A bill to provide for a visitor center at Salem Maritime National Historic Site in the Commonwealth of Massachusetts.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire property for use as a visitor center at Salem Maritime National Historic Site, Massachusetts.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a visitor center at Salem Maritime National Historic Site in the Commonwealth of Massachusetts.
